title: Food Standards Code // <![CDATA[ _spBodyOnLoadFunctionNames.push("setupPageDescriptionCallout"); // ]]>
cleaned_text: The standards in the Australia New Zealand Food Standards Code are legislative instruments under the Legislation Act 2003. The authoritative versions of these standards are on the Australian Government [Federal Register of Legislation](https://www.legislation.gov.au/) or via the links below. You can access [Food Standards Gazette notices here](/code/changes/gazette/pages/default.aspx). To contact us via email about the [Food Standards Code please click here](/pages/FoodStandardsCodeEnquiry.aspx). FSANZ does not provide advice on compliance with the Code.
